a group of similar independent companies or countries who join together to control prices and limit competition

ECONOMICS a group of similar companies who agree prices between them in order to increase profits and limit competition: operate/form a cartel Supermarkets were accused of operating a cartel on the price of many staple foods. a banking/oil cartel a price-fixing/illegal/drugs cartel
